trigger: Standing water or persistent moisture present in crawlspace
action_item: Defer weatherization. Notify client and supervisor. Require drainage correction or professional remediation before proceeding.
documentation: Photo of water/moisture, field notes, remediation invoice or report.
policy_text: Standing water or persistent moisture must be remediated prior to weatherization work.

trigger: Visible mold, rot, or fungal growth observed in crawlspace
action_item: Defer work. Notify program manager and client. Require remediation or professional mold treatment.
documentation: Photo of mold/rot/fungal growth, remediation report, post-remediation photo.
policy_text: Crawlspace must be free of visible mold and rot before weatherization can proceed.

trigger: Damaged, missing, or unsealed vapor barrier in crawlspace
action_item: Scope for vapor barrier repair or replacement per program specs. Install and document coverage.
documentation: Pre- and post-repair photos, vapor barrier material spec sheet.
policy_text: Crawlspace vapor barriers must be intact and continuous per program standards.

trigger: Structural failure or unsafe access (joist rot, missing supports, sagging floor)
action_item: Defer weatherization in affected areas. Notify program manager. Require structural repair by qualified contractor.
documentation: Photo of failure, contractor report, repair verification photo.
policy_text: Structural failures must be corrected before weatherization proceeds.

trigger: Open or disconnected ductwork in crawlspace
action_item: Scope for duct sealing, repair, or proper termination. Verify and document correction before final inspection.
documentation: Photo of duct issue, repair log, post-repair photo.
policy_text: Ductwork in crawlspaces must be continuous, sealed, and properly terminated.

trigger: Evidence of animal infestation or pest presence in crawlspace
action_item: Defer work. Notify client. Require pest control and cleaning prior to weatherization.
documentation: Photo of infestation evidence, pest control invoice, post-cleanup photo.
policy_text: Animal infestation must be remediated before weatherization begins.

trigger: Exposed, unsafe, or unprotected wiring in crawlspace
action_item: Defer work in affected area. Require correction by licensed electrician before proceeding.
documentation: Photo of wiring, correction invoice, post-correction photo.
policy_text: Unsafe or unprotected wiring must be corrected before work resumes.

action_item: Scope for perimeter or floor insulation per program specs. Document pre- and post-installation.
documentation: Photo of uninsulated area, insulation spec sheet, post-install photo.
policy_text: Crawlspace insulation must meet or exceed program minimums after install.
